name: Snake Eater
description:
A simple Snake clone with the game library SFML and C++.

 Like my last game, this one is no different, it is just a clone of the classic game Snake.

There are no added features, innovative designs, or sound effects. Literally, it is just a clone of Snake. And, by the way, I decided to call it "Snake Eater" for no reason other than I like MGS3, and its a... well, a Snake clone.

Either way, check my GitHub for the source code or download and play it.

Enjoy and thank you!
